abstract: JPMorgan Chase’s chief insists that any hostility toward the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau was all just a misunderstanding.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase’s chief insists that any hostility toward the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau was all just a misunderstanding.
lead_paragraph: Jamie Dimon, it turns out, has a soft spot for the government’s new consumer financial bureau.

headline.main: Actually, Jamie Dimon Now Likes New Consumer Bureau

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
